description: Triangle read by rows: number of monoids of order n with k idempotents, considered to be equivalent when they are isomorphic or anti-isomorphic (by reversal of the operator).
links: Index entries for sequences related to monoids
crossrefs: Row sums give A058133. Main diagonal: A002788(n-1). Columns 1-3: A000001, A058148, A058149.
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 14 2000
